org.jetel.data

Class ByteDataField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataField
      • org.jetel.data.DataFieldImpl
        • org.jetel.data.ByteDataField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompressedByteDataField

    public class ByteDataField
extends DataFieldImpl
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    A class that represents array of bytes field.

    Note: it has no sence to test this field for null value as even all zeros can indicate meaningful value. Yet, the isNull & setNull is implemented.
    Since:
    October 29, 2002
    See Also:
    DataFieldMetadata, Serialized Form

      • setNull

        public void setNull(boolean isNull)
        Description copied from class: DataField
        Sets the Null value indicator/status. If passed-in value is True, then the field's internal value is set to NULL. The nullability of the field is checked and if the NULL value is not permitted, the BadDataFormatException is thrown.
        Overrides:
        setNull in class DataFieldImpl
        Parameters:
        isNull - The new Null value

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: DataField
        An operation which sets/resets field to its initial value (just after it was created by JVM) - it varies depending on type of field.
        Nullable fields are set to NULL, non-nullable are zeroed, if they have default value defined, then default value is assigned.
        Specified by:
        reset in class DataField

      • getValueDuplicate

        public byte[] getValueDuplicate()
        Description copied from class: DataField
        Returns the duplicate of the internal value of the data field. If field's value is deemed to be NULL (isNull() return true) then the returned value is NULL. Otherwise the duplicate of the internal value is converted to appropriate object representation and returned.
        Specified by:
        getValueDuplicate in class DataField
        Returns:
        The Value value
        See Also:
        DataField.getValueDuplicate()

      • toByteBuffer

        public int toByteBuffer(CloverBuffer dataBuffer,
               java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder encoder,
               int maxLength)
                 throws java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
        Description copied from class: DataField
        Encode the field's value into ByteBuffer. The numeric value is encoded as a string representation.
        Overrides:
        toByteBuffer in class DataFieldImpl
        Parameters:
        dataBuffer - buffer where the field's value is written
        encoder - encoder which is used for string to byte conversion
        maxLength - for string based fields (DataFieldMetadata.isByteBased() == false) maximum number of character written to output buffer; byte based fields can ignore this parameter
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Description copied from class: DataField
        Checks whether two DataField objects are equal. Both fiels should be of the same type. If they are not, ClassCastException is thrown.
        Two datafields where each is flagged as to be NULL (isNull() returns true) are deemed NOT equal.
        Specified by:
        equals in class DataField
        Parameters:
        obj - Description of Parameter
        Returns:
        Description of the Returned Value
